data.title: ANGEL OF MY LIFE (REGGAETON REMIX) Lyrics
meta_keywords: Listen to ANGEL OF MY LIFE (REGGAETON REMIX) Song Online
ANGEL OF MY LIFE (REGGAETON REMIX) Song MP3 by Paul Play
Download ANGEL OF MY LIFE (REGGAETON REMIX) Song from HITSVILLE
data.meta_description: ANGEL OF MY LIFE (REGGAETON REMIX) Lyrics by Paul Play. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
beeen waiting all my life for the one i love shes always in my dreams shes my fantasy the moment i saw you walking through that door girl i knew youre the one my oh my 2x baby let me take it to the top let my loving fill you up until the morning comes everytime i see your face tears of passion can be traced will you be my wifey you and me forever baby girl wanna let you know you mean the world to me girl never felt the way i feel with you before girl dont ever leave me lonely without you girl my life is incomplete you are the angel of my life my life my oh my angel of my life 4x youre the one i want youre the one i need no more late night dreams no more fantasy baby hold my hands tell me that you care cause only you could set me free repeat bridge repeat rap: whats wrong with the world mama why you acting like you aint got no lover i guess its time we share love between one another sit back and relax and listen to a brother moreover we were meant for each other i buy you chanel, d&g and gucci leather baby girl i aint just trying to say that my past is too clean it may seem like all i wanna do is slide in between girl me and you we can just be friends or be my wife we can be like this until the end no need to strife theres no need to for us to pretend we live our life, real better make dividends yes adlib: my oh my 2x i wanna be your lover one and only lover (repeat ad lib) girl wanna let you know you mean the world to me girl never felt the way i feel with you before girl dont ever leave me lonely without you girl my life is incomplete you are the angel of my life my life my oh my angel of my life 4x ad lib: my angel, my angel angel of my life you, you angel of my life Writer(s): Paul Babatunde Dairo
Lyrics powered by www.musixmatch.com
